channel.title: Dual Mafia 13/22
channel.description:
## Welcome
### Rules Normal Forum rules apply
### Gameplay Days will be 5 IRL days long, or shorter if someone dies Nights will be 2 IRL days long Actions are done by messaging me Mafia/Werewolves will talk through DMs When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it
### Executions To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" Voting is majority based Executions end the Day
### Journals Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed
### To Join To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
### Roles
[details="Town Roles"] > # [color = "green"] Cop [/color] > **[color = "green'] Town Investigative [/color]** > > Night Ability - Learn target player's alignment > *Goal: Eliminate the Mafia and Serial Killer and have at least one town member survive*
> # [color = "green"] Vigilante [/color] > **[color = "green'] Town Killer [/color]** > > Night Ability - Kill target player > *Goal: Eliminate the Mafia and Serial Killer and have at least one town member survive*
> # [color = "green"] Doctor [/color] > **[color = "green'] Town Support[/color]** > > Night Ability: - Target player will survive any attacks on them tonight > *Goal: Eliminate the Mafia and Serial Killer and have at least one Hunter survive*
> # [color = "green"] Citizen[/color] > **[color = "green'] Town Generic[/color]** > > You have no ability's > > *Goal: Eliminate the Mafia and Serial Killer and have at least one town member survive* [/details]
[details="Hunter Roles"] > # [color = "lightblue"] Seer [/color] > **[color = "lightblue'] Hunter Investigative [/color]** > > Night Ability - Learn target player's alignment > *Goal: Eliminate the Werewolves and Serial Killer and have at least one Hunter survive*
> # [color = "lightblue"] Slayer [/color] > **[color = "lightblue'] Hunter Killer [/color]** > > Night Ability - Kill target player > *Goal: Eliminate the Werewolves and Serial Killer and have at least one Hunter survive*
> # [color = "lightblue"] Angel [/color] > **[color = "lightblue'] Hunter Support[/color]** > > Night Ability: - Target player will survive any attacks on them tonight > *Goal: Eliminate the Werewolves and Serial Killer and have at least one Hunter survive*
> # [color = "lightblue"] Recruit [/color] > **[color = "lightblue'] Hunter Generic [/color]** > > You have no ability's > > *Goal: Eliminate the Werewolves and Serial Killer and have at least one Hunter survive* [/details]
[details="Mafia Roles"] > # [color = "red"] Godfather [/color] > **[color = "red"] Mafia Support [/color]** > > Passive - You are night immune. You appear to be town to investigations > > *Goal: Eliminate the town and have at least 1 surviving mafia member*
> # [color = "red"] Consiglire [/color] > **[color = "red"] Mafia Investigative [/color]** > > Night Ability - Learn target player's subtype (investigative, killer, support, generic) > > *Goal: Eliminate the town and have at least 1 surviving mafia member*
> # [color = "red"] Mafioso [/color] > **[color = "red"] Mafia Killer [/color]** > > Passive: You cannot be roleblocked if you preform the kill > > *Goal: Eliminate the town and have at least 1 surviving mafia member* [/details]
[details="Werewolf Roles"] > # [color = "tan"] Alpha Wolf[/color] > **[color = "tan"] Werewolf Support [/color]** > > Passive - You are night immune. You appear to be a Hunter to investigations > > *Goal: Eliminate the Hunters and have at least 1 surviving Werewolf*
> # [color = "tan"] Mystic Wolf [/color] > **[color = "tan"] Werewolf Investigative [/color]** > > Night Ability - Learn target player's subtype (investigative, killer, support, generic) > > *Goal: Eliminate the Hunters and have at least 1 surviving Werewolf*
> # [color = "tan"] Wolf Cub [/color] > **[color = "tan"] Werewolf Killer [/color]** > > Passive: You cannot be roleblocked if you preform the kill > > *Goal: Eliminate the Hunters and have at least 1 surviving Werewolf* [/details]
[details="Neutral Roles"] > # [color = "gray"] Serial Killer [/color] > **[color = "gray"] Neutral Killer [/color]** > > Passive: You are night immune. > > Night Ability: Kill target player. Bypasses healing. > > *goal: Eliminate the town and hunters*
> # [color = "gray"] Mastermind [/color] > **[color = "gray"] Neutral Support [/color]** > > Night Ability: Roleblock target player. They will lose investigation and night immunity if they have it. > > *goal: Survive* [/details]
### Rolelist: The role list will consist of: 7 Town Members 7 Hunters 3 Mafia 3 Werewolves 1 Serial Killer 1 Mastermind
Players: 1. CaptainNerbins - Alive 2. Firekitten - Alive 3. Memesky - Alive 4. @MaximusPrime - Alive 5. @Htm - Alive 6. @Sam17z - Alive 7. @Margaret - Alive 8. @Marluxion - Alive 9. @Shurian - Alive 10. @Whammerist - Alive 11. @Hippolytus - Alive 12. @Ashe - Alive 13. @MtheJoker - Alive 14. player14 - Alive 15. player15 - Alive 16. player16 - Alive 17. player17 - Alive 18. player18 - Alive 19. player19 - Alive 20. player20 - Alive 21. player21 - Alive 22. player22 - Alive
